# stringrb

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

A base R version of [stringr](https://github.com/tidyverse/stringr).

Combines the good parts of [petermeissner/stringb](https://github.com/petermeissner/stringb) 
and [hadley/stringb](https://github.com/hadley/stringb).
